altTitles.ja: 天国大魔境

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.ja: 美しい壁に囲まれた世界で暮らす子供たち。少年・トキオはある日、「外の外に行きたいですか？」というメッセージを受け取る。一方、外では、マルとおねえちゃんがサバイバル生活をしながら、天国を求めて、魔境となった世界を旅している。未来の日本を「あね散歩」。
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

description.en: Hana is a child who is known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.
description.ko:
유전자조작 쥐로 알려져 있는 아이 HANA(하나),
하나가 연구실에서 탈출하면서 일어나는 이야기들.

description.en: For centuries, adventurers have slaughtered monsters for sport and hunted goblins for their body parts and linens. But why? This is the question, Nog, the goblin inventor, has been trying to answer. After accidentally unlocking an arcane power that allows Nog to "level up" and grow in strength, he finally discovers the confidence to chase the answer to his question. Nog will set on a perilous quest across the world with his best friend, Gubble, to discover why humans hunt goblins! Can monsters and adventurers live in peace?
description.pt-br: Durante séculos, os aventureiros massacraram monstros por esporte e caçaram goblins por suas partes do corpo e tecidos. Mas por quê? Essa é a pergunta que Nog, o goblin inventor, está tentando responder. Após desbloquear acidentalmente um poder arcano que permite que Nog “suba de nível” e ganhe força, ele finalmente descobre a confiança para buscar a resposta para sua pergunta. Nog partirá em uma perigosa jornada pelo mundo com seu melhor amigo, Gubble, para descobrir por que os humanos caçam goblins! Será que os monstros e os aventureiros podem viver em paz?

altTitles.ja: 「触れたい」は恋の始まり

altTitles.en: "I Wanna Touch You" Then Love Begins.

altTitles.pt-br: "Eu quero tocar em você" então assim, o amor começa.

description.en:
Kaede Minato, the cool literature girl, is admired by her classmates for her elegant appearance. Momoko Hattori, a cute girl with an adorable face, quickly became an idol among her peers shortly after she entered high school.

Despite having little connection, they quickly grow closer after Momoko finds Kaede in a particular situation...

A story of two girls experiencing a love that is not quite love yet.
description.pt-br:
Kaede Minato, a garota legal da literatura, é admirada por seus colegas de classe por sua aparência elegante. Momoko Hattori, uma garota fofa com um rosto adorável, rapidamente se tornou um ídolo entre seus colegas logo após entrar no ensino médio.

Apesar de terem pouca conexão, elas rapidamente se aproximam depois que Momoko encontra Kaede em uma situação particular...

Uma história de duas garotas vivenciando um amor que ainda não é bem amor.

altTitles.ja: ギルデッド・セブン

description.en: Historical Action about a police officer hunting down the "La Llorona" mexican crime cartel. After catching a bunch of high-ranking members, suddenly a Yellowstone volcano errupts & the cop time-leaps to the 19th wild west a few days after Lincoln got assassinated. He steps into a gruesome scene of native americans getting slaughtered. But suddenly the supposedly dead Abrahalm Lincoln appears and kills the attackers.

title.en: The Story of Our Corpse Hunt

altTitles.ja: ぼくたちの死体さがし

description.en:
A boy x a summer x an adventure = "Boy Meets Crime"!

Shocking juvenile suspense!

One day during the summer vacation, a young boy called Isshin, Kazuma Inui, leaves with his friends who attend the same junior high school to meet again with "that girl" who disappeared several years ago.
And all the truths lead to child kidnapping cases that are rampant in the land. Depicting the darkness of society!

Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

altTitles.ja: 見えてますよ！　愛沢さん

description.en:
Michi, plagued forever by her ability to see ghosts, pretends like she can't in order to avoid them at all costs. But recently she found a ghost she just can't ignore: Aizawa Honami, ex-classmate and ex-member of the famous idol group De:LPhinus, hanging around school from some lingering attachment.

Still, no matter what ghost it is, Michi's not getting involved. Though while she steels her heart, her eyes keep coming back to Honami's bizarre antics and passionate fanservice...(?)
description.id:
Michi, diganggu selamanya oleh kemampuannya untuk melihat hantu, berpura-pura seperti dia tidak bisa melihat mereka untuk menghindari mereka bagaimanaoun itu.

Tapi baru-baru ini dia menemukan hantu yang tidak bisa dia abaikan:
Aizawa Honami, mantan teman sekelas dan mantan anggota grup idola terkenal De:LPhinus, berkeliaran di sekolah karena keterikatan yang masih melekat.

Tetap saja, tidak peduli hantu apa itu, Michi tidak terlibat.
Meskipun saat dia menguatkan hatinya, matanya terus kembali ke kejenakaan aneh dan fanservice Honami yang penuh gairah...(?)
description.ja:
昔から幽霊が見えることに悩まされていたみちは、なるべく関わらないよう見えないフリを続けていた。

しかし、そんな彼女でも無視できない幽霊が最近出てきた。それは大人気アイドルグループ「De:LPhinus」の元メンバー、愛沢ほなみ。クラスメイトでもあった彼女は、未練から教室に出るようになったのだ。

相手が誰であれ、幽霊である以上関わらない。そう決意するみちではあるが、ほなみの幼稚で破天荒な行動と熱烈なファンサービス（？）に気付けば目で追っていて……。
description.es-la:
Michi, maldecida para siempre con la capacidad de ver fantasmas, finge que no puede verlos precisamente porque quiere evitarlos a toda costa.

Pero recientemente se encontró con un fantasma que no puede ignorar: Aizawa Honami, excompañera de clase y ex miembro del famoso grupo de Idols "De:LPhinus", quien también era compañera de clase, comenzó a aparecer en el salón de clases por algún motivo.

Aun así, no importa qué fantasmas sean, Michi no quiere involucrarse. Mientras protege su corazón, sus ojos continúan observando las payasadas y el fanservice (?) de Honami.
description.pt-br:
Michi, amaldiçoada para sempre pela habilidade de enxergar fantasmas, finge que não pode vê-los justamente porque quer evitá-los a todo custo.

Mas recentemente ela encontrou um fantasma que não pode ignorar:
Aizawa Honami, ex-colega de classe e ex-membro do famoso grupo de idols De:LPhinus, fica perambulando em torno da escola com ainda algum tipo de vínculo.

Ainda assim, não importa o que fantasmas são, Michi não quer se envolver.
Enquanto ela blinda seu coração, seus olhos continuam a observar as travessuras e fanservide de Honami.

description.en: I wasn't being bullied, just isolated. That's all.

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

altTitles.ja: トゥー マッチ ペイン

altTitles.zh: 痛彻心扉 too much pain

description.en:
Her name was Megumi Takahashi, and she was his first love. Okamoto's daily routine was to leave his house early so he would be able to see Megumi walk to school, never daring to speak to her. He only had one chance to talk to her, and then she disappeared from his hometown a half-year later.  
  
Four years have passed since she moved away. Okamoto was looking through his daily porn stash when he finds out the porn he's watching starred Megumi under the name Chiemi Mizutani. Furthermore, Megumi ends up working at the same company that Okamoto currently works. Okamoto's love life is going to face some exciting times, for better or for worse.

altTitles.ru: Гарем рабов в лабиринте другого мира

altTitles.ja: 異世界迷宮でハーレムを

altTitles.en: A Harem in the Fantasy World Dungeon
Harem in the Labyrinth of Another World

description.en: A man was about to commit suicide and decides to search for a way to die in the internet, but then he found an odd site that asked a lot of questions and had a point based system that allows you to create skills and abilities for a character. He took interest in it and when he finished setting his character he was asked: "You will now be transported to a world with the settings you choose, coming back is not possible, do you still accept?" Without thinking much of it he pressed YES and found himself in another world with the skills and abilities he chose to have.
description.ja:
少年のチートでハーレムな冒険譚が始まる!!
「人生なんてこんなもん――」。世の中に絶望した少年が見つけたとあるサイト。この世界で生きづらいなら異世界で生きてやれ、とクリックした先は、ホントに異世界!? しかもボーナスポイントを振りまくったおかげで最強の男に生まれ変わった彼は、アイドル級の美少女を手に入れる権利を得られそうで…!? 生まれ変わった少年のチートでハーレムな冒険が今始まる！
description.pt-br: Um homem estava prestes a cometer suicídio e decide procurar uma maneira de morrer na internet, mas depois encontrou um site estranho que fez muitas perguntas e teve um sistema baseado em pontos que permite que você crie várias habilidades para um personagem . Ele se interessou por isso e, quando ele acabou de definir o seu personagem, lhe foi perguntado: Você será agora transportado para um mundo com as configurações que você escolher, voltar não é possível, você ainda aceita?. Então, sem pensar muito, ele Pressionou SIM e encontrou-se em outro mundo com as habilidades que escolheu ter.

title.en: Owari no Seraph: Ichinose Guren, 16-sai no Catastrophe

altTitles.ja: 終わりのセラフ　一瀬グレン、１６歳の破滅

altTitles.vi: Owari no Seraph: Ichinose Guren, Sự diệt vong năm 16 tuổi

altTitles.en: Seraph of the End—Guren Ichinose: Catastrophe at Sixteen

altTitles.ru: Последний Серафим: Катастрофа шестнадцатилетнего Глена Ичиносе

description.en: A short while before the apocalypse, 15-year-old Guren Ichinose enrolls at Daiichi Shibuya High, a magical training school. Witness his trials as he must hide his true strength even as he is trampled on at a school for the insufferably privileged. [Kodansha]
description.ru:
История разворачивается незадолго до того, как мир охватил страшный вирус, погубивший всех старше 13.  
Юный Глен Ичиносе поступает в элитную академию Сибуя. Академия принимает в основном отпрысков высшего света, и скромного происхождения Глен ну никак не вписывается в эту «благородную картину». Однако амбиции и талант этого молодого человека не привыкли опускаться из-за кастовой принадлежности. В нелегком пути, который избрал Ичиносе, его сопровождает девушка, объявившая себя его невестой. Имя ей Махиру Хираги, и она — единственная отрада Глена среди напыщенных одноклассников.   
Сей история о юности и трагедиях легендарного капитана отряда «Лунных демонов» — Глена Ичиносе.
description.vi: Chuyển thể dựa trên Light Novel cùng tên, đây là câu chuyện về Ichinose Guren, câu chuyện xảy ra trước sự kiện Diệt Thế trong *Seraph of the End.*

altTitles.es: Rurouni Kenshin: Una historia romántica de un espadachín de la era Meiji

altTitles.en: Kenshin the Wanderer: Meiji Swordsman Romance

altTitles.ja: るろうに剣心―明治剣客浪漫譚―

description.en:
140 years ago in Kyoto, with the coming of the American "Black Ships," there arose a warrior who, felling men with his bloodstained blade, gained the name Hitokiri, man slayer! His killer blade helped close the turbulent Bakumatsu era and slashed open the progressive age known as Meiji . Then he vanished, and with the flow of years, became legend.  
  
Ten years later, a young woman's life is saved when she happens upon a strange wandering swordsman named Kenshin. The young woman accepts the wanderer into her dojo, despite his secretive past, and the two become fast friends. As their relationship grows, they meet and make more friends (as well as enemies), and they grow accustomed to their life together.  
  
However, one man can only run from his past for so long, and it isn't long before Kenshin is forced to face the life he thought he'd left behind. Now, together with his friends, he must fight the ghosts of his past if he wants the people he loves to have any kind of future.  
  
Contains a side story called Yahiko no Sakabato.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Samurai X** (2001)

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.ja: シルフの花姫

description.en:
The adventures of a lonesome princess and meddlesome nun.
*(It's recommended you read the serialized manga first, in the related tab.)*

* **Volume 1:** The original self-published story.
* **Volume 2:** Pre-serialization extras.
* **Volume 3:** Post-serialization extras.
*(Extras take place outside the story. The canon's best described as 'under construction', continuity's nonexistent, and the chapter numbers are simply the order I translate them in, not the order they were drawn. If they have serious plot spoilers I'll mark them as such.)*

altTitles.en: A Story About How the Relationship Between Two People That They Had Built Since Childhood, Changed

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

altTitles.th: โตเกียวกูล-เล่ม

altTitles.ja: 東京喰種 －トーキョーグール－

description.en:
Lurking within the shadows of Tokyo are frightening beings known as "ghouls," who satisfy their hunger by feeding on humans once night falls. Ken Kaneki, an unsuspecting university freshman, finds himself caught in a world between humans and ghouls when his date turns out to be a ghoul after his flesh.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
description.ru:
Раса гулей существует с незапамятных времен. Ее представители вовсе не против людей, они их даже любят - преимущественно в сыром виде. Любители человечины внешне неотличимы от нас, сильны, быстры и живучи - но их мало, потому гули выработали строгие правила охоты и маскировки, а нарушителей наказывают сами или по-тихому сдают борцам с нечистью. В век науки люди знают про гулей, но как говорится, привыкли. Власти не считают людоедов угрозой, более того, рассматривают их как идеальную основу для создания суперсолдат. Эксперименты идут уже давно…  
  
Ничего этого не ведал Канэки Кэн, робкий и невзрачный токийский первокурсник, безнадежно влюбленный в красавицу-интеллектуалку Ризэ, частую гостью в кафе «Место встречи», где парень подрабатывает официантом. Не думал Кэн, что скоро самому придется стать гулем, и многие знакомые предстанут в неожиданном свете. Главному герою предстоит мучительный поиск нового пути, ибо он понял, что люди и гули похожи: просто одни друг друга жрут в прямом смысле, другие - в переносном. Правда жизни жестока, переделать ее нельзя, и силен тот, кто не отворачивается. А дальше уж как-нибудь!
description.pt-br: Em Tokyo, criaturas conhecidas como "Ghouls" vivem entre os humanos e os devoram para sobreviver. Alheio a eles, o jovem universitário Ken Kaneki leva uma vida pacata entre livros, até que um trágico encontro o coloca diante desses seres e o obriga a lutar por sua humanidade.

Touhou Drunken Butterfly Flower ~ Lotus Eaters' Sobering

Flor de Borboleta Bêbada Oriental ~ Os Bêbados e Sóbrios Comedores de Lotus

description.en: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
description.ja: 幻想郷の人里にある居酒屋「鯢呑亭（げいどんてい）」には、最近、飲んだ帰りの客が妖怪にさらわれて失踪するという噂が。博麗神社の巫女・霊夢はこの疑惑の調査に乗り出す。どうやらカギは看板娘の美宵のようで…？
description.es-la:
En la aldea humana de Gensokyo, un rumor sobre un youkai que supuestamente secuestra a personas alcoholizadas se extiende de forma repentina con gran rapidez, causando miedo y preocupación entre la gente. Mientras tanto, en el centro de este rumor, el bar izakaya Geidontei, no hay nada fuera de lugar en lo que respecta a su comida y bebida, o incluso con respecto a su propietario.

Cuando la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei se entera de la situación, intenta cumplir con su deber de investigar el sospechoso establecimiento. Sin embargo, el caso la lleva a otra persona: Miyoi Okunoda, cuya existencia parece ser tan volátil como una burbuja.
description.pt-br:
Uma estranha história sobre álcool. O mais novo mangá oficial de "Touhou", escrito por ZUN.   
  
Existe um rumor de que em um bar chamado "Geidontei", localizado em uma área remota de Gensokyo, um cliente bêbado foi sequestrado por um youkai. Reimu, sacerdotisa do Santuário Hakurei, embarca em uma investigação, mas aparentemente, a chave para desvendar o caso está na garçonete da loja…?

altTitles.ja: バナナフィッシュ

description.en: Nature made Ash Lynx beautiful; nurture made him a cold ruthless killer. A runaway brought up as the adopted heir and sex toy of "Papa" Dino Golzine, Ash, now at the rebellious age of seventeen, forsakes the kingdom held out by the devil who raised him. But the hideous secret that drove Ash's older brother mad in Vietnam has suddenly fallen into Papa's insatiably ambitious hands—and it's exactly the wrong time for Eiji Okamura, a pure-hearted young photographer from Japan, to make Ash Lynx's acquaintance…
description.tr: Tanrı, Ash Lynx’i güzeller güzeli bir çocuk olarak yarattı; dünya onu soğukkanlı acımasız bir katil haline getirdi. Çocuk yaşta evden kaçan Ash, “Baba” Dino Golzine tarafından bulunur ve hem mafyanın varisi olarak hem de Golzine’nin şahsi zevklerini tatmin etmek üzere yetiştirilir. Şimdi 17 yaşında isyankar bir genç olan Ash kendisini yetiştiren şeytanın ona sunduğu krallığa sırtını döner. Ancak Ash’in ağabeyinin Vietnam’da aklını yitirmesine sebep olan korkunç sır, hırsı dur durak bilmeyen Golzine’nin ellerine düşmüştür. İşte tam bu sırada genç bir fotoğrafçı Japonya’dan New York’a gelir. Temiz kalpli Eiji Okumura ve Ash Lynx olabilecek en talihsiz zamanda karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: A natureza fez Ash Lynx um cara bonito; mas o tempo fez dele um assassino cruel e frívolo. Uma criança fugitiva criada como um herdeiro adotado, um guerreiro treinado, e o brinquedo sexual de seu “Papa”, Dino Golzine, o senhor do crime da Costa do Oeste Oriental. Ash está agora na idade rebelde dos dezessete anos – abandonando o reino de poder e riqueza, realizada pelo demônio que o ressuscitou, preferindo um código para viver entre um pequeno, mas fiel, gangue de bandidos de rua. Porém, “Papa” não pode simplesmente deixá-lo ir. Não quando descobre que o segredo que levou o irmão mais velho de Ash a loucura, no Vietnã, poderá cair em suas mãos insaciavelmente ambiciosas. É exatamente o momento errado para Eiji Okamura, um jovem fotógrafo do Japão, de coração puro, chegar em Nova York e travar conhecimento de Ash Lynx… e ao seu lado, ser atraído para dentro de um redemoinho sangrento de orgulho, ganância, luxúria e ira desencadeada pelo enigma de codinome Banana Fish.

description.en:
Beginning of the 13th century, Western Xia state in Chinese mainland. 
In those days existed a woman warrior named Shut Hell, the Evil One, feared even by the Mongols, reputed the strongest army in history. 
At first she was just a normal Tangut soldier, but after coming close to death so many times she found a superhuman strength in herself. 
On the other side Yurul, a young Mongol prince, is fascinated by the Tangut, his enemies' writing script, and is worried for their future…
Centuries later a Japanese high school student named Shudo is haunted by a vivid dream of a battlefield...
Is there some sort of bound between these completely different lives ? Will they manage to overcome the obstacles surrounding them ?


- **2012 Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize (New Creator) winner**
description.pt-br: Um Jovem chamado Sudou desperta em uma de suas vidas passadas onde ele era uma guerreira Xia chamada Shut Hell a maligna, temida até pelos Mongóis de Genghis Khan que estão unindo forças para acabar com a dinastia Xia Ocidental. a história ocorre no Século 13 onde a Maligna junto com a principe Yurul se esforçam para preservar Xia e sua cultura e escritas.

description.en:
For as long as he remembers, Komi has been shorter than his fellow classmates. He always felt inferior as a result, until he met Obinata - a girl who is head and shoulders above him. 

Yes, Asumi Obinata is tall. She’s imposing. But she’s also Komi Amane’s girlfriend. And these two are the happiest kids in the world. 

The super-popular oneshot has been expanded to a full series here!
description.pt-br:
Pelo que ele pode lembrar, Komi sempre foi mais baixo que seus colegas de classe. Ele sempre se sentiu inferior por causa disso, até que conheceu Obinata – uma garota que é muito mais alta que ele.

Sim, Asumi Obinata é alta. Ela é imponente. Mas ela também é a namorada de Komi Amane. E esses dois são as crianças mais felizes do mundo.

altTitles.ja: 一勝千金

description.en:
"Yup! Just as slow as I thought."

After retiring from public fighting and getting fired from underground fighting, 27 year old Tenma Nozomi's zest for life is gradually dwindling away. It's hard to be at the bottom with nowhere to go, and that's exactly where she and her two friends are. However, Nozomi hits upon an idea that may just solve all of their problems: they could make their own underground fighting circuit for women, and tap into an underexplored market. As good as that sounds, her insistence on including the unknown quantity Hongou Hina may prove to be more than she bargained for...
description.ja:
女子×裏格闘×団体運営＝？？？

格闘団体をクビになった天馬希望（てんまのぞみ）は一攫千金を夢見て、幼なじみの2人と女子だけの裏格闘団体を立ち上げる！しかし、興行を成功させるためスター選手として招き入れたのは、可愛らしい見た目からは想像できないとってもキケンな女子高生で…！？金か？ 夢か？ 革命か？

altTitles.ja: バガボンド

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

description.en:
Kang Minhyuk suffers from a rare disorder that makes it impossible for him to stop eating. Despite strict diet and exercise, Minhyuk’s weight is now life-threatening. As a last resort, his doctor recommends a unique treatment—Athenae, a VR game where one can eat as much as they want without consequence. Crispy fried chicken! Scrumptious samgyetang! Inside Athenae, all food tastes real, but earning it is no cakewalk. In order to live, Minhyuk must go on the ultimate fantasy gourmet adventure!

Menderita penyakit langka di mana hanya ada dua orang penderita di seluruh dunia, Minhyuk harus hidup sambil mengontrol nafsu makannya. Segala cara sudah dicoba untuk mengurangi berat badan Minhyuk, namun itu hanya semakin membuatnya lapar hingga dokter pribadinya menyarankan 'Athenae'. Sebuah VR Game di mana pemainnya bisa makan sepuasnya di dalam sana tanpa khawatir berat badan naik. Begitulah petualangan Minhyuk dimulai, tentu saja ditemani makanan-makanan lezat pada setiap quest-nya!

personaggio principale è colpito da una rara condizione che colpisce solo due persone in tutto il mondo, la bulimia. Organizza i suoi pasti quotidiani per sopravvivere, ma la sua speranza di sopravvivenza si affievolisce con il passare dei giorni. Consulta un medico, che gli suggerisce di giocare al gioco della realtà alternativa "Athenae", dove può mangiare quanto vuole senza ingrassare. Gioca per salvarsi la vita e crescere in forza non facendo altro che mangiare! Una vita fantastica da gourmet!

サクサクのチキン、伸びるチーズのピザ、夜中の1時に食べるラーメン！ ただおいしいものが食べたいだけなのに… 「暴食欠如症」どれだけ食べても食欲が満たされない奇病。 俺はこの病気のせいで体重170キロの巨漢になり、とうとう生命まで危なくなってしまう！ そこで新しい治療法として仮想現実ゲーム「アテネ」をすることに。 そこでは味が感じられて、おまけにラーメン100杯食べても太らない世界！ たくさん食べたい一心でプレイしていただけなのに、どんどんレベルアップしていって…!?

คังมินฮยอก เป็นผู้ป่วยโรคกินไม่หยุด หนึ่งในโรคหายากที่มีแค่ไม่กี่คนในโลก
เขาต้องออกกำลังกายและควบคุมอาหารในแต่ละวันอย่างยากลำบากเพื่อให้มีชีวิตรอด
แต่แล้วหมอก็แนะนำวิธีการรักษาแบบใหม่ด้วยการเล่นเกมออนไลน์เสมือนจริง ""อาเธเน่"" ที่ผู้เล่นสามารถรับรู้รสชาติอาหารในเกมได้
เรื่องราวการผจญภัยแสนอร่อยชวนน้ำลายสอของมินฮยอกจึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!

description.zh:
敏赫身高185cm，他控制食量，每天运动4个小时，可他的体重却只能控制在170kg。他家境优渥、成绩优异，各方面都很完美，除了体重。这都是因为他患有罕见的暴食性缺失症。不管吃多少东西，他都无法得到满足。完美体验味觉感受的虚拟现实游戏——雅典，也许是可以解救他的最后一把钥匙？！

description.zh-hk:
主角患有全世界只有兩名患者的
罕見疾病——「暴食型飽足感缺失症」，
為了活下去，他每日努力控制飲食，
卻仍看不見希望。

在醫生的建議下，
他進入了虛擬實境遊戲《雅典奈》，
在遊戲裡，就算盡情大吃也不會變胖。
為了活下去而開始玩遊戲的他，
展開了一段美食雲集的奇幻人生!

altTitles.ja: 元ヤン娘、恋をする

altTitles.en: A Former Delinquent Girl Falls in Love

description.en: Spin-off/Spiritual Sequel of the authors other work "The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other"; with this story focusing on the mask wearing former delinquent and her budding romance with the little brother of the Female MC of the previous work.

altTitles.ja: 絶叫学級

description.en:
Welcome to the classes of horror! I will be your guide to a world that lurks under everyday life. For these lessons, you don't need text books or notebooks.  
If you're prepared for the worst…

Lu Nanzhi reincarnated into a stand-in romance novel as vicious female rival, and her task is to make the heroine Chen Xi achive happiness. The industry beauty thought that attacking the heroine was also a way to ‘make the heroine happy’, so she took the initiative to pursue the heroine. But she gradually felt that the attitude towards herself from the surrounding characters seemed to be different from that in the book?

altTitles.ja: もう触れないキミ

altTitles.en: You Who Can't Touch Me Anymore

altTitles.vi: Tớ không thể chạm vào cậu được nữa

description.en: In their high school days Shiraishi would tease her classmate Arashi constantly always touching his shaved head. Now, many years later, Shiraishi finds herself enthralled with a rising celebrity that she sees on TV an in magazines. This celebrity being none other that Arashi, her former classmate, now with long grown out hair. She wanders the streets hoping that by some happenstance she might once again meet him and be able to tell him the things she's kept in her heart for so many years. A tale of lost opportunities and love separated by time...
description.ja: 昔触りまくっていた坊主頭の同級生が芸能人に…

altTitles.zh-ro: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang
Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Referred to as “The Cobra” by her employees, art director Lu Meihe appears to most as a strict and callous boss but she is actually rather innocent at heart. She has a secret crush on her intern Lin Wenjing, but because of her public image, she cannot express her feelings openly and instead pours them into the sketchbook she always carries with her. One day, she accidentally leaves the sketchbook behind only for it to be discovered by Lin Wenjing. Lu Meihe soon realizes that while Lin Wenjing may seem gentle and carefree, she may actually be hiding a secret persona of her own. Today my intern bullied me again, I’m so happy I don’t know what to do!
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

altTitles.ja: バーサス

description.cs: Lidstvo bylo po stovky let utlačováno kvůli vzestupu a invazi našich přirozených nepřátel "démonů". Světu vládl "Velký král démonů" a jeho 47 "ďábelských vládců". Zatímco lidé žijí ve strachu, 47 lidí bylo vybráno z celého světa a zíkslai titul "Hrdinové" a připravují se na boj proti armádě velkého krále démonů. A nyní začíná plán jak zachránit lidstvo, jehož osud je teď na tenkém ledě.
description.en:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
___
**Compositor:** [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71)

**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625)
description.ja: 天敵“魔族”の台頭と侵攻により、人類が虐げられ続けて数百年。世界は“大魔王”と、その配下である47体の“魔王”により支配されていた。人々は怯えて暮らしながらも、世界中から選び抜かれた47人を“勇者”と名付け、魔王軍に対抗すべく準備を進めていた。そして今、人類の存亡を懸けた決死の作戦が始まろうとしていた―――。
description.ru:
Уже сотни лет человечество вынуждено существовать под гнётом своих естественных врагов — демонов, сумевших захватить мир. В их главе стоит Повелитель тьмы, и в подчинении его находятся сорок семь Королей.
Однако среди людей, чей дух сломлен вековым страхом, было отобрано столько же наречённых Героев, готовых сразиться с демонической армией. И, кажется, отчаянная борьба за судьбу человеческой расы начинается прямо сейчас...
description.pt-br: A humanidade foi oprimida por centenas de anos devido à ascensão e invasão do inimigo natural "demônios". O mundo era governado pelo "Grande Lorde Demônio" e seus 47 "Senhores Demônios". Enquanto as pessoas vivem com medo, 47 pessoas selecionadas de todo o mundo foram nomeadas "Heróis" e estão se preparando para lutar contra o exército do Rei Demônio. E agora, uma operação desesperada com a sobrevivência da humanidade em jogo estava prestes a começar.

description.en:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."
description.id: Putri Leah membuat surat bunuh diri menjelang pernikahannya. Karena dia yakin akan mati setelah malam pernikahannya; akhir yang sangat menyedihkan dari seorang putri yang mengorbankan hidupnya untuk kerajaannya. Tetapi sebelum menyerahkan hidupnya, Leah berencana untuk membuat balas dendam terakhirnya kepada keluarganya. Meskipun dia telah menjadi mayat yang dingin, dia akan membuat mereka hancur. Dia akan membuat mereka malu dengan menjadi pengantin yang tidak perawan lagi. “Kenapa kau justru membuang keperawananmu? Bukankah kau hanya ingin melarikan diri?" "Aku ... aku hanya ingin mati." Leah secara impulsif menceritakan hal tersebut kepada pria yang menghabiskan malam pertama dengannya.

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en:
Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert... I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat... ahem, heroes!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/rosen-garten-saga-manga/525/), [MangaPlaza](https://mangaplaza.com/title/0303005019/)
description.ja: 野盗に村を襲われたリンは、窮地の中、１本の剣を手にする。その剣は英雄・ジークフリートの魂が宿った魔剣で、リンは圧倒的な力で野盗たちを制圧する。だが、リンの股間にはもう１本の凶悪な“剣”がそそり立っていて…!?
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

altTitles.ja: テニスの王子様

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

altTitles.ja: お嬢様の僕

altTitles.es-la: El Sirviente de la Joven Dama

description.en: The story centers around a main character who was raised as a butler from his family's trade, and who one day meets a rich young lady who cannot even change her own clothes, let alone know what to do in the outside world.
description.ja: 父は執事、母はメイドという両親の元で生まれ育ち、世話焼き属性が染みついた主人公の前に現れたのは、身の回りのことが何も出来ないお嬢様。
description.pt: A história se concentra em um personagem principal que foi criado como mordomo do comércio de sua família e que, um dia, conhece um jovem rica que nem sequer consegue trocar sua própria roupa e, muito menos, saber o que fazer no mundo exterior.
description.es-la: La historia se centra en un personaje principal que fue criado como un mayordomo por la ocupación de su familia, y que un día conoce a una joven rica que no puede siquiera cambiarse la ropa por su propia cuenta, y mucho menos, saber qué hacer en el mundo exterior.
description.pt-br: A história se concentra em um personagem principal que tem uma personalidade intrometida cujo pai é um mordomo e cuja mãe é uma criada e que, um dia, conhece uma jovem rica que nem sequer consegue trocar sua própria roupa e, muito menos, saber o que fazer no mundo exterior

description.en:
Children who are beginning their youth.  
Their growing pain on their way to spring.

altTitles.es: No subestimes al personaje de apoyo

altTitles.ja: 傍観者、●●ちゃん

description.en:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

**Contents:** 139 + 30 (epilogue) + 9 (side story) = 178 chapters
- **Vol. 1:** main story (ch. 1-139)
- **Vol. 2:** epilogue (ch. 140-169)
- **Vol. 3:** side story (ch. 170-178)

description.fr: Elle se réveille un jour dans son roman préféré. Ce serait l'occasion de briller, sauf qu'on lui a donné un rôle de potiche absolue ! Aucun moyen d'approcher l'héroïne ni les 3 hommes qui lui tournent autour comme des mouches. Pas grave, elle arrivera coûte que coûte à exister ici !
description.id: Aku, bertemu dengan tiga pria ganteng seantero negeri. Putera mahkota, Bangsawan termuda sampai pemilik neraka sihir, Mereka semua mendambakan satu orang perempuan, Evelyn. Dia adalah temanku. Ketiga pria itu mendekati Evelyn dengan cara masing-masing. Lalu aku? Hanya menonton di pojokan saja. Bentar... Sepertinya aku pernah melihat eh maksudku membaca adegan ini.. Apa?! ruapanya aku berada di dalam dunia novel kesukaanku??!!
description.ja: 突然の目眩に襲われて目覚めると愛読していた小説の世界に引き込まれてしまった！？しかも女主人公をいじめる雑魚キャラ「ラテ・アクトリー」に転生…！！ どうせ人生唯一の楽しみである小説がリアルに堪能できれば満足と思いきや… 傍観者でいるつもりがだんだん目立ち始める「ラテ」 果たしてイケメンとの恋は成就するのか…！？
description.ko:
깨어나보니 내가 가장 좋아하는 소설 속에 들어와 버렸다!
그런데 주인공도 악역도 아닌… 눈물 나는 분량의 ‘들러리’라고?

현실에 치여사는 스물 다섯 학원 강사 김혜정! 그런데 즐겨 읽던 소설 <야수의 꽃> 세계로 떨어져 소설 속 인물 ‘라테 엑트리’가 된다.

…그런데 기왕 들어오게 해 준거 소설 속 미남들과 썸 좀 타는 주인공이 되게 해주지. 
여주인공을 괴롭히다 털릴 예정의 조연 라테 엑트리가 되어버리다니! 
에휴~ 그러면 그렇지 내 팔자야.

그래, 기왕 이렇게 된 거 열심히 구경이나 하자!
어차피 소설 보는 재미로 살아왔던 인생! 소설이 눈앞에서 실현된다는데 어찌 마다하겠는가! 
팝콘이나 먹으며 구경하지 뭐. 와작!

그런데 조연이었던 라테는 오히려 소설 속에서 자신의 존재감을 점점 내보이게 되는데…? 
소설 속의 들러리양의 파란만장한 구경기가 시작된다!
description.zh: 一睁开眼…竟然穿越到了我最近在追的小说里？可是为啥不按套路出牌，没有女主命的我竟然穿越到一个没有一丁点戏份的悲催小配角身上？事已至此我还是努力给自己加戏吧！抢在女主出场前跟三个男主来一场完美的邂逅，实现穿越人生的逆袭之路！
description.pt-br: Hyejung adorava ler novels para fugir do estresse diário. Isso era antes dela acordar dentro do mundo estranho de sua comic favorita! Só tem um detalhe, ao invés dela acordar como a heroína da história que é cortejada pelos três melhores galãs, agora ela é Latte Ectrie, uma vilã secundária que geral odeia. De uma forma ou de outra, agora ela tem a chance de assistir a sua comic favorita de camarote com muita pipoca. Mas... É impressão ou a narrativa está tomando um rumo meio... Diferente?

altTitles.ja: おやすみストレイシープ

description.en:
Japan is the country with the shortest sleep time in the world. Despite being born in such a sleep-deprived country, Shinya Moroboshi is an unemployed man who sleeps a lot and lives a self-indulgent life that has nothing to do with lack of sleep. One day, Moroboshi finds an unfamiliar "sleep selling app" on his phone. He uses it with some skepticism, but to his surprise, he is able to actually sell his sleep and make money...!? This is a story that will light up the tomorrow of a deep, never-ending night.

(Source: Comic Zenon, translated)

title.en: My Father Has Become a Beautiful Girl and It's a Lot of Pain

altTitles.ja: 父親が美少女になってしまって色々つらい

altTitles.ja-ro: Chichioya ga Bishoujo ni Natte Shimatte Iroiro Tsurai

altTitles.en: My Father Turned into a Beautiful Girl and It's a Lot of Trouble.

altTitles.ru: Мой отец превратился в красивую девушку и это доставляет много хлопот.

altTitles.id: Ayah ku berubah menjadi gadis cantik dan itu sangat sulit bagi ku

description.en:
One day, a beautiful girl enters Tatsuya's room... only to reveal that it’s his father, completely transformed by the shock of losing his job!
Confused by the father he no longer recognizes, Tatsuya begins to experience gradual changes in their once-distant father-son relationship.
As the father takes on a more motherly role, and Tatsuya starts acting more like the father, or perhaps a close friend becomes like a father figure...

A new TS comedy that, despite being called ‘biologically impossible’ on social media, is surprisingly a father-son story that will warm your heart!

(Source: Amazon JP, edited)
description.ru:
Однажды в комнату Тацуи заходит красивая девушка... и, к его удивлению оказывается его отцом, который полностью изменился из-за шока от увольнения с работы! !
Хотя он и растерян перед своим отцом, потерявшим все (?), меняются ли мало-помалу отношения между родителем и ребенком, которые раньше были далекими? ? ?
Отец Тацуи потерял все. Тацуя с недоумением смотрит на отца, но расстояние между отцом и сыном постепенно сокращается...?
Отец – это мать, а сын – это отец? Нет, мой лучший друг — мой отец, а мой отец — мой лучший друг...?
Новая комедия TS, которая, несмотря на то, что в социальных сетях ее называют "физиологически невозможной", на самом деле является удивительной историей отца и сына, которая согреет ваше сердце!!!

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Kano-sensei wa, Choppiri Ecchi na Katei Houmon de Kimi to no Ai wo Haguku Mitai.

description.en: The new teachers at high school student Touma Nijino's school are his ex-girlfriends who dumped him in the past! Moreover, both Akamine Shuri and Shirasawa Kohaku are still in love with him. He is happy to see them again, but.... But he is not happy to see them again... "Hey, can I kiss you?" "Do you hate sleeping with me?" They start competing with each other at the same time, trying to make an already established fact with Tohru before graduation. Moreover, they live in the same apartment complex as Tohru and are trying to secretly nurture their love as a "commuter wife"...? This is a sweet love comedy with ex-girlfriend teachers who tempt you with everything they've got!
description.ja: 高校生・虹野透真の学校に新任教師としてやって来たのは、かつて彼を振った元カノたちだった！　しかもその教師、赤峰朱里と白沢琥珀の二人はどっちも透真に未練がありまくり。思いがけない再会に喜ぶ透真だったが……。「ねえ、チューしていい？」「私との添い寝、嫌いになったの？」卒業までに透真と既成事実を作ってしまおうと、ふたり同時に抜け駆けスタート。しかも透真と同じマンションに住み、「通い妻」としてこっそり愛を育もうとしてきて――!?　全力で誘惑してくる元カノ教師との、甘々ラブコメディ！！
description.es-la: Las nuevas profesoras del estudiante Touma Nijino son sus ex novias que le dejaron en el pasado. Además, tanto Akamine Shuri como Shirasawa Kohaku siguen enamoradas de él. Se alegra de volver a verlas, pero.... No se alegra de volver a verlas... "Oye, ¿puedo besarte?" "¿Odias acostarte conmigo?" Empiezan a competir entre ellas al mismo tiempo, tratando de concretar un hecho ya establecido con Tohru antes de la graduación. Además, viven en el mismo complejo de apartamentos que Tohru e intentan alimentar su amor en secreto como una "esposa viajera"...? ¡Esta es una dulce comedia de amor con ex-novias profesoras que te tientan con todo lo que tienen!

altTitles.en: The Greatest Sect Leader of All-Time

description.en: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
description.fr: Ma quête est de développer une secte qui serait un foyer chaleureux pour ses membres. Dedans, non seulement le chef de secte est amusant (ouais c'est moi) mais les disciples sont excentriques, aux personnalités très variées. Ils ont comme particularités d'être en constante évolution et d'être anormalement forts. Tous se révèlent être des gros bonnets, et moi, leur patriarche, je deviendrai invincible ! Approchez, les enfants, rejoignez ma secte et ensemble nous réaliserons vos rêves !

description.en:
Demon Queen Abyss is worried… She's not able to defeat the Hero, considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This Hero is still an inexperienced young man—he should be easy to defeat! … However, the problem is that he, not knowing Abyss's true identity, considers her his “Master” and has become very fond of her…!?
___
**Producer & Supervisor:** [studioHEADLINE](https://mangadex.org/author/657c3108-5817-4669-a957-a9c7ec5080ee/studio-headline)
description.pt-br: A Rainha Demônio Abyss está preocupada... ela não é capaz de derrotar o herói, considerado o inimigo mortal dos demônio. Esse herói ainda é um jovem inexperiente — ele deveria ser fácil de derrotar! ... Todavia, o problema é que ele, não conhecendo a verdadeira identidade de Abyss, a considera sua "Mestra" e gosta muito dela...!?

description.en:
In Tokyo, suspicious cases are occurring where the victims have all of their blood drained from them.  
Mikogami Keiji, a detective who also wants revenge for his lover, killed 10 years ago, pursues the culprit, the “Man with two faces”.  
What is the identity of the silver-haired girl who observes him…?  
  
A new serialization by the author of [Boku Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/10643/boku-girl)

---

**Assistant:** [Hoshikawa Danpa](https://mangadex.org/author/3814dd6f-c7b9-4ced-a9ee-a393eb4c06a7)
description.ru:
В Токио происходит ряд странных убийств, когда у всех жертв проподает вся кровь.  
Микогами Кейджи, детектив, который хочет отомстить за свою возлюбленную, убитую   
10 лет назад, преследует преступника, именуемого «Человек с двумя лицами».  
Какова же личность седовласой девушки, которая наблюдает за ним?..   


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/cube_sa)
description.vi:
Ở Tokyo, nhiều vụ án mạng kì lạ với nạn nhân bị rút hết máu liên tục diễn ra. Mikogami Keiji, một thám tử vì muốn trả thù cho ngưòi yêu là nạn nhân trong vụ án 10 năm trước đang trên đường truy tìm hung thủ - Lưỡng Diện Nhân. Còn nhân tướng cô gái tóc bạc quan sát anh ấy là ai? 
Một tác phẩm mới đến từ tác giả của Boku Girl.

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!
